rules_text:
When Beckoner of Ends enters, target player discards a card. Integrate that card. [i](Exile it, then you may choose a nonland permanent it’s integrated onto.)[/i]
Beckoner of Ends has deathtouch as long as a land card is integrated onto it.
notes:
!canoncard Liliana’s Specter
 101: Integrating is now optional.
